author: aljosa
title: OctoWars - a DCCG based world
description: カルダノには、無限に遊べて、毎日新しいユーザーを獲得できるような高品質なゲームはありません。

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal problem statement and solution are aligned with the challenge. However, this proposal did not explain on how it will add value to Cardano. Moreover, this proposal did not present any information on its key metrics related to the challenge. Please provide details on who are the target user and how many user that is estimated to be onboard Cardano with this game.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer only provided 1 verifiable link on its team members while the other 5 remains unknown. Please provide a link to their profiles for evidence of their skills and experience needed to successfully implement the project. The proposer also did not present the required manpower and resources to implement the project. Furthermore, there are no detail budget breakdown from the funds required. Please explain in details on what will the fund requested be used on. The amount funds requested is also quite huge for acceleration of development.  In addition, the proposer did not mention any of the risks and challenges that they might face during the development.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposer provided a roadmap with timeframes for achievement. However, the proposer fails to provide any links to their website or social media. Please provide a link to platforms where voters can keep track of your work progress and engagement for accountability. Moreover, the proposer fails to emphasize on the key metrics of success of the proposal. The only information provided is the delivery time of the game without any mention on what is success metrics such as target user that is aimed to be onboard.

f6_assessments.q0: Digital collectable games have a good market ( US$2 billion in 2020) Therefore there is a need for the development of these in Cardano. The project proposes a Digital collectible game. The theme is on octopus war. WIth respect to games, it is very difficult to estimate the efficacy of the game in getting market share with the number of details provided.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposal has referenced a developer with more than 20 years of experience. However, the development will be involved, and it isn't easy to evaluate the capability of the team based on the provided information.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal has provided a roadmap in major blocks with the expected completion date by the end of 2020. The rationale and breakdown of projects phase-wise for the budget would have added value to the project.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal aims to deploy an online board/card game to bring new players to the Cardano blockchain.
f6_assessments.q1:
The leader Linkedin profile indicates that this person might be able to deliver a good online card/board game. There is no information about the other 4 team members.
Moreover, it is unclear the game dynamic and structure and whether if the game will use NFTs to represent cards/other objects in the game, and how the blockchain will intervene to differentiate this game from other online games.
f6_assessments.q2:
The budget required is higher than other proposals within the gaming challenge, and it's not clear how it will be spent, as there's no breakdown. The only information available is that it will be used to accelerate the game development.
The roadmap as listed leads to think that the developer has not outlined a clear schedule for the project development. For example: "We expect to integrate all the parallel processes, like the blockchain R&D, into a single process with a predictable iteration and deployment model": this item does not indicate the type of model used (scrum/agile ?).

solution: OctoWarsは、コアストーリーに十分な材料があり、無限に拡張でき、プレイヤーをCardanoのエコシステムにさらすことができるゲームです。
